message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $11,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering what it can do for you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. This is a fair price that benefits both of us. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is quite high. I could meet you halfway at $10,250. This is my final offer.
